name: Rocketcat
description: Rocketcat is an oscilloscope themed robot belonging to the WebtrES club. With its shiny black box body, it stands out among its fellow robots. Its red and black screen perfectly displays all kinds of waveforms and data. Rocketcat is equipped with rocket arms and legs, allowing it to move swiftly and gracefully. Its unique feature is the cat-shaped buttons on its surface, adding a touch of whimsy to its appearance. Rocketcat also sports a pair of stylish shades as its special addon, giving it a cool and mysterious vibe.
